verses.verse: Unto the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Congregation <S%G1577><s%> of Ephesus <S%G2179><s%> write <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5657><s%>; These things <S%G3592><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> he that holdeth <S%G2902><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> walketh <S%G4043><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> candlesticks <S%G3087><s%>;

I know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> labour <S%G2873><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> thou canst <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> bear <S%G941><s%> <S%G5658><s%> them which are evil <S%G2556><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> thou hast tried <S%G3985><s%> <S%G5668><s%> them which say <S%G5335><s%> <S%G5723><s%> they are <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> emissarys <S%G652><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hast found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5627><s%> them <S%G846><s%> liars <S%G5571><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> hast borne <S%G941><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hast <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name's sake <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3686><s%> hast laboured <S%G2872><s%> <S%G5758><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hast <S%G2577><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> fainted <S%G2577><s%> <S%G5758><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%G235><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> somewhat against <S%G2596><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> thou hast left <S%G863><s%> <S%G5656><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> love <S%G26><s%>.

Remember <S%G3421><s%> <S%G5720><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> from whence <S%G4159><s%> thou art fallen <S%G1601><s%> <S%G5758><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> repent <S%G3340><s%> <S%G5657><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5657><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>; or else <S%G1490><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> will remove <S%G2795><s%> <S%G5692><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> candlestick <S%G3087><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>, except <S%G3362><s%> thou repent <S%G3340><s%> <S%G5661><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> thou hast <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> thou hatest <S%G3404><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the deeds <S%G2041><s%> of the Nicolaitans <S%G3531><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> I also <S%G2504><s%> hate <S%G3404><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.

He that hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> an ear <S%G3775><s%>, let him hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5657><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto the Congregations <S%G1577><s%>; To him <S%G846><s%> that overcometh <S%G3528><s%> <S%G5723><s%> will I give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5692><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> <S%G5629><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tree <S%G3586><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the paradise <S%G3857><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> unto the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Congregation <S%G1577><s%> in Smyrna <S%G4668><s%> write <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5657><s%>; These things <S%G3592><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is alive <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5656><s%>;

I know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> tribulation <S%G2347><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> poverty <S%G4432><s%>, (but <S%G1161><s%> thou art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%>) and <S%G2532><s%> I know the blasphemy <S%G988><s%> of them which <S%G3588><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%> they <S%G1438><s%> are <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> are the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> of Satan <S%G4567><s%>.

Fear <S%G5399><s%> <S%G5737><s%> none <S%G3367><s%> of those things which <S%G3739><s%> thou shalt <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5719><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> <S%G5721><s%>: behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, the devil <S%G1228><s%> shall <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5719><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5629><s%> some of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye may be tried <S%G3985><s%> <S%G5686><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5692><s%> tribulation <S%G2347><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>: be thou <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5737><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> unto <S%G891><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5692><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> a crown <S%G4735><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>.

He that hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> an ear <S%G3775><s%>, let him hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5657><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto the Congregations <S%G1577><s%>; He that overcometh <S%G3528><s%> <S%G5723><s%> shall <S%G91><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> be hurt <S%G91><s%> <S%G5686><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> to the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Congregation <S%G1577><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Pergamos <S%G4010><s%> write <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5657><s%>; These things <S%G3592><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> he which hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the sharp <S%G3691><s%> sword <S%G4501><s%> with two edges <S%G1366><s%>;

I know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> thou dwellest <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, even where <S%G3699><s%> Satan's <S%G4567><s%> seat <S%G2362><s%> is: and <S%G2532><s%> thou holdest fast <S%G2902><s%> <S%G5719><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hast <S%G720><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> denied <S%G720><s%> <S%G5662><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those days <S%G2250><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Antipas <S%G493><s%> was my <S%G3450><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> martyr <S%G3144><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> was slain <S%G615><s%> <S%G5681><s%> among <S%G3844><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, where <S%G3699><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> dwelleth <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a few things <S%G3641><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> thou hast <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> them that hold <S%G2902><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of Balaam <S%G903><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> taught <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5707><s%> Balac <S%G904><s%> to cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5629><s%> a stumblingblock <S%G4625><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%G2474><s%>, to eat <S%G5315><s%> <S%G5629><s%> things sacrificed unto idols <S%G1494><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to commit fornication <S%G4203><s%> <S%G5658><s%>.

So <S%G3779><s%> hast <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> them that hold <S%G2902><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of the Nicolaitans <S%G3531><s%>, which thing <S%G3739><s%> I hate <S%G3404><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.

Repent <S%G3340><s%> <S%G5657><s%>; or else <S%G1490><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> will fight <S%G4170><s%> <S%G5692><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the sword <S%G4501><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%>.

He that hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> an ear <S%G3775><s%>, let him hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5657><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto the Congregations <S%G1577><s%>; To him <S%G846><s%> that overcometh <S%G3528><s%> <S%G5723><s%> will I give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5692><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> <S%G5629><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the hidden <S%G2928><s%> <S%G5772><s%> manna <S%G3131><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5692><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> stone <S%G5586><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the stone <S%G5586><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> knoweth <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5627><s%> saving <S%G1508><s%> he that receiveth <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5723><s%> it.

And <S%G2532><s%> unto the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Congregation <S%G1577><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Thyatira <S%G2363><s%> write <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5657><s%>; These things <S%G3592><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> his <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> unto a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> are like <S%G3664><s%> fine brass <S%G5474><s%>;

I know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> charity <S%G26><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> service <S%G1248><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> to be more than <S%G4119><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%>.

Notwithstanding <S%G235><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a few things <S%G3641><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> thou sufferest <S%G1439><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that woman <S%G1135><s%> Jezebel <S%G2403><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> calleth <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%> herself <S%G1438><s%> a prophetess <S%G4398><s%>, to teach <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5721><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to seduce <S%G4105><s%> <S%G5745><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to commit fornication <S%G4203><s%> <S%G5658><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> <S%G5629><s%> things sacrificed unto idols <S%G1494><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> her <S%G846><s%> space <S%G5550><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> repent <S%G3340><s%> <S%G5661><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> her <S%G846><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> she repented <S%G3340><s%> <S%G5656><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

Behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> will cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5719><s%> her <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a bed <S%G2825><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> them that commit adultery <S%G3431><s%> <S%G5723><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> her <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> tribulation <S%G2347><s%>, except <S%G3362><s%> they repent <S%G3340><s%> <S%G5661><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I will kill <S%G615><s%> <S%G5692><s%> her <S%G846><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Congregations <S%G1577><s%> shall know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5695><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> <S%G5748><s%> he which <S%G3588><s%> searcheth <S%G2045><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the reins <S%G3510><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5692><s%> unto every one <S%G1538><s%> of you <S%G5213><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto the rest <S%G3062><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Thyatira <S%G2363><s%>, as many as <S%G3745><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> doctrine <S%G1322><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> have <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> known <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the depths <S%G899><s%> of Satan <S%G4567><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> they speak <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>; I will put <S%G906><s%> <S%G5692><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> other <S%G243><s%> burden <S%G922><s%>.

But <S%G4133><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> already hold fast <S%G2902><s%> <S%G5657><s%> till <S%G891><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I come <S%G302><s%> <S%G2240><s%> <S%G5661><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he that overcometh <S%G3528><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> keepeth <S%G5083><s%> <S%G5723><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> unto <S%G891><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%>, to him <S%G846><s%> will I give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5692><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> he shall rule <S%G4165><s%> <S%G5692><s%> them <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a rod <S%G4464><s%> of iron <S%G4603><s%>; as <S%G5613><s%> the vessels <S%G4632><s%> of a potter <S%G2764><s%> shall they be broken to shivers <S%G4937><s%> <S%G5743><s%>: even <S%G2504><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G2504><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5758><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5692><s%> him <S%G846><s%> the morning <S%G4407><s%> star <S%G792><s%>.

He that hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> an ear <S%G3775><s%>, let him hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5657><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto the Congregations <S%G1577><s%>.
